column1: Funeral services will be held at 1 p.m. on Saturday
column3: 2015 at Johnson Funeral Home. Reverend Steve James will officiate. Interment will be at Prien Memorial Park. Visitation will be on Friday from 5 until 7 p.m. and will resume on Saturday from 11 a.m. until service time. Pallbearers are John Brian Green
